column1: #   - expandVerbEntry() / expandAdjectiveEntry() generate all inflected forms
#   - NO automatic conjugation expansion (base forms only)
#   - conj_type is stored but NOT used for expansion
#   - Dynamic analysis handles conjugated forms at runtime:
#     1. Unknown word → verb_candidates / adjective_candidates generates candidates
#     2. Base form lookup in dictionary provides cost/POS info
#     3. Lemmatizer maps conjugated form back to base form
#   - Fixed expressions with particles (鬼滅の刃)
#   - Words that would be incorrectly split
# Required to distinguish from verb renyokei + そう patterns
# e.g., 難しそう (adj) vs 話しそう (verb) - both have kanji + し + そう structure
# よい has irregular conjugation (よ- stem, not よい- stem)
# Note: Basic adverbs (なかなか, いつも, etc.) are in L1 adverbs.h
# Note: な形容詞 + に patterns (非常に, 本当に, etc.) handled by L1 na_adjectives.h
# Note: Most verbs are handled by dynamic analysis
# Only add verbs that cause disambiguation issues
# B65: 詰まる - moved to L1 for conjugation expansion
# These -げる/-ける verbs are often confused with Godan potential forms
# B38: のろける - split as の+ろける
# B46: とりあげる - split as と+りあげ
# B60: あきらめる - split as あきら+める
# --- Formal nouns (形式名詞) - hiragana forms ---
# Note: もの/こと are in L1 with appropriate costs
# 今日: Removed to allow 今日中 as single token (handled by scoring)
# 今: Removed to allow 今日中 etc. as single tokens (handled by scoring)

column3: しょっきあらいかんそうき

column1: # B37: しびれ - split as し+びれ
# B41: ひと味 - split as ひ+と+味
# B42: ぬいぐるみ - recognized as OTHER
# B44: 盛りだくさん - split as 盛りだく+さん
# Cost balanced: higher than formal noun もの (0.3) to prefer particle も between
柳の下にいつも泥鰌はいない
column3: やなぎのしたにいつもどじょうはいない
しっぱいはせいこうのはは
さいしょからさいごまで

column1: # Modern internet slang terms that don't follow regular morphological patterns
# These need explicit entries to prevent 漢字+い misinterpretation as i-adjective
# e.g., 検討いたしております would become 検討い(ADJ)+たしております without this
# Low cost (-0.5) to beat unknown ADJ candidates with optimal_length bonus
# Note: Basic greetings (こんにちは, ありがとう, etc.) are in L1 greetings.h
# Note: さすが is in L1 na_adjectives.h
# Note: Variable-length prolonged patterns (うわーーー) handled by emphatic pattern in tokenizer
# --- Mixed script compounds (カタカナ + 漢字) ---
# These won't be generated by unknown word handler since it only creates same-type sequences
# --- サブカル・スラング複合名詞 ---
# カタカナ+漢字/ひらがな混合で誤分割されるもののみ
# These are verb renyokei forms commonly used as standalone nouns
# 感じ needs higher cost to not beat 感じる conjugations
# 感じがあった should parse as 感じ(NOUN) + が, but 感じた should be 感じ(VERB) + た
# 吾輩は猫である (wagahai) 対応 - W-001〜W-009
# おさん - 削除: テキスト固有の人名。汎用的な解決策が必要
# ニャー, ニャーニャー - 削除: 特定の擬音語。カタカナ擬音語の汎用認識が必要
# Note: せんだって is already added in W-004
# いう (言う) - cost balanced to not break Xという determiners
